name: Monster Bash (itch)
description:
YOU ARE THE PARTY GOD AND YOU MUST MAINTAIN THE PARTY VIBES BY YEETING DIFFERENT MONSTERS INTO PARTIES.

Each party has a Fun meter (blue) and Rowdy meter (pink). The fun meter constantly drains while the rowdy meter constantly fills. If fun reaches zero or rowdy reaches full, you lose!

Werewolves will raise fun and rowdy (party animal),
Medusa will lower fun and rowdy (buzz kill),
Witch will reset both bars! A true party savant


WASD to move
Click to grab/throw monsters
ESC to quit
R to Reset
P to Pause
